Howdy partner, I'm Ryan 🎩

The names Lay, Ryan Lay.

Other than bearing a striking similarity to potatoes, I’ve just graduated from UC San Diego and I’m working on a few projects and experiments in the CS education space.

I have experience leading multi-disciplinary teams from 5 person dev teams to an 80 person student organization. I am frequently in public speaking positions coordinating logistics for large scale events.

In my spare time, I’ve directed a hackathon 🔱; led a club ♣; won a lettuce eating competition 🥬; built a VR app; raced mountain bikes 🚵‍♂️; built robots 🤖; acted in a fan film ⚔️; and made some art 🎨.

Also, I’m a big star wars nerd.
